  • Method Details

    • parseUserTags

      private static ArrayList<String> parseUserTags(String userTagsString)
      Parses the user tags String into separate tag strings contained in an ArrayList
      Parameters:
      userTagsString - : The String to parse ( format : "tag1;tag2;tag3;")
      Returns:
      : ArrayList containing individual tag strings

    • formatUserTags

      private static String formatUserTags(ArrayList<String> userTags)
      Formats a user tag ArrayList into a String
      Parameters:
      userTags - : The ArrayList to format
      Returns:
      : Formatted String

    • getFileExtension

      private FileType getFileExtension(File fd)
      This method returns an enum based on the extension of a file
      Parameters:
      fd - : File Object
      Returns:
      FileType enum

    • getMetadata

      public Metadata getMetadata(File fd) throws ID3TagException, BadFileTypeException
      This method reads the metadata of a file and returns it in a hashmap Fields included in the hashmap are : title, artist, genre, cover, duration
      Parameters:
      fd - : mp3 File Object
      Returns:
      Metadata object
      Throws:
      ID3TagException - (if no ID3v2 tags are found)
      BadFileTypeException

    • getRadioMetadata

      private Metadata getRadioMetadata(File fd)
      This method assigns default metadata to a radio file
      Parameters:
      fd -
      Returns:

    • setMetadata

      public void setMetadata(Metadata metadata, File fd) throws BadFileTypeException, org.jaudiotagger.tag.FieldDataInvalidException, org.jaudiotagger.audio.exceptions.CannotWriteException
      This method writes the passed metadata to the file at the given path
      Parameters:
      metadata - : Metadata object to write to the given song file
      fd - : File object corresponding to the song to modify (wav or mp3)
      Throws:
      BadFileTypeException
      org.jaudiotagger.tag.FieldDataInvalidException
      org.jaudiotagger.audio.exceptions.CannotWriteException

      Tag object

    • readWAVFile

      private org.jaudiotagger.audio.AudioFile readWAVFile(File fd)
      This method reads the file and returns it as an AudioFile object
      Parameters:
      fd - : WAV File Object
      Returns:
      AudioFile object
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - (can be IOException, TagException, ReadOnlyFileException, CannotReadException, InvalidAudioFrameException)

      Returns:
      AudioFile object
      Throws:

    • readFile

      private org.jaudiotagger.audio.AudioFile readFile(File fd) throws BadFileTypeException
      This method reads the file and returns it as an AudioFile object currently supports MP3 and WAV files only

      fd - : File Object
      Returns:
      AudioFile object
